hero.subtitle: Junior full-stack developer based in Belgium

subtitle.first: I'm 22 years old and live in the Liège region. Passionate about creating practical tools and elegant websites, I'm constantly looking for new ideas and opportunities to learn.
subtitle.second: It was during my bachelor's degree in graphic techniques that I discovered the world of web development. Initially, it was the infinite possibilities offered by this field that captivated me, but very quickly, I developed a true passion for coding itself.
subtitle.third: Today, what I seek above all is to discover, experiment, and continually progress.

skills.second: What I know how to use

pressionpro.title: PressionPro
pressionpro.description: Website created for an independent high-pressure cleani ng professional

modal.presentation:
This website was one of my very first projects. It was a showcase site for a self-employed professional offering high-pressure cleaning services. 

 My goal was to highlight his services with a clean and professional design. Unfortunately, the site is no longer online, as the business has since been discontinued.
modal.techno: For this project, I used WordPress along with the Elementor page builder, which allowed me to quickly create a modern and responsive interface. I also customized an existing theme to better match the client’s needs while following CMS best practices.
modal.learned: This project gave me my first real experience working with a client. I learned a lot—both technically and in terms of communication. I got to handle content management, client feedback, and I made a few mistakes that helped me grow and that I wouldn’t repeat today.

landing.title: Old personal website
landing.alt: Showcase image of my old personal website
landing.description: A portfolio website to introduce myself and my services

modal.presentation: This project was my old personal website. It was a portfolio site that introduced me and showcased my services. At the time, I was considering starting out as a full-time freelancer, but I eventually decided to postpone that plan. I’ll probably reuse this site if I decide to work as a part-time freelancer in the future.
modal.techno: To build this site, I used Laravel—a framework I was already familiar with from previous courses. The visual part was made using Blade components, TailwindCSS for styling, and GSAP for animations.

contact.title: Discuss new opportunities together
contact.subtitle: I am always open to discussing new ideas, projects, or job opportunities, so don’t hesitate to contact me!

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.paragraph1: All content on this site (texts, images, logos, photographs, videos, structure, design, source code, etc.) is protected by Belgian and international intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.paragraph2: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication or adaptation of all or part of these elements, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited without prior written permission from the site owner.

personalData.title: 4. Personal Data
personalData.introduction: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, delete and object to your personal data. To exercise these rights, you can contact me via the email address mentioned above.

collection.title: Collection of Personal Data
collection.introduction: This site may collect the following data:
collection.connectionData: Connection data (IP address, date and time of connection)
collection.formData: Data provided voluntarily through contact forms

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.description: This site uses technical cookies necessary for its operation. Traffic analysis cookies may also be used to improve user experience and site content.

hyperlinks.title: 5. Hyperlinks
hyperlinks.description: This site may contain links to other websites. I am not responsible for the content of these sites or their data protection practices.

applicableLaw.title: 6. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
applicableLaw.description: These legal notices are subject to Belgian law. In the event of a dispute, the Belgian courts will have exclusive jurisdiction.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding these legal notices, you can contact me at the email address mentioned above.
